# confluence Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Using environment variables
provider "confluence" {

```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `host` (String) Confluence's service hostname
- `token` (String, Sensitive) Confluence's username token
- `user` (String) Confluence's service username
